e1704c28-bc27-4a21-855f-94631c333cfd.name: token
e1704c28-bc27-4a21-855f-94631c333cfd.description:
Receives the JWT token to be verified.

Example:
```
"eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJmb28iOiJiYXIiLCJpYXQiOjE2NzY5MTAyOTIsImV4cCI6MTY3NjkxMDQxMn0.rBayWKAETkf9AZaduzjbYfv6684Du8dfH23sQzXuaHU"
```

76318593-02a9-4f1d-8330-753f01f4cee7.name: secretOrPrivateKey
76318593-02a9-4f1d-8330-753f01f4cee7.description:
Receives the secret for HMAC algorithms or the PEM encoded private key for RSA and ECDSA.

Example:
```
HASH
```

1d260e13-512e-43a0-9a87-ca1d85735ff6.type:
{
  optional "algorithm": string,
  optional "audience": string,
  optional "complete": boolean,
  optional "issuer": string,
  optional "jwtid": string,
  optional "ignoreExpiration": boolean,
  optional "ignoreNotBefore": boolean,
 optional "subject": string,
  optional "clockTolerance": number,
  optional "maxAge": (string or number),
  optional "clockTimestamp":  number,
  optional "nonce ":  string,
  optional "allowInvalidAsymmetricKeyTypes": boolean
}
1d260e13-512e-43a0-9a87-ca1d85735ff6.name: options

c94acdd8-374b-4967-b111-3133a133295a.name: payload
c94acdd8-374b-4967-b111-3133a133295a.description:
Sends the decoded payload if the signature is valid and optional expiration, audience, or issuer are valid.

Example:
```
{ "foo": "bar" }
```
